Detailed Description

Special option class for the singleChoiceOptions.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<typename InIt>
CommandlineOptionHandler::SingleChoiceOption::SingleChoiceOption (  const MC2String &  shortName,
InIt  firstLongName,
InIt  lastLongName,
uint32 *  optionValue,
uint32  defaultValue,
const MC2String &  helpText
)  [inline]
 

Constructor.

The arguments match CommandlineOptionHandler::addSingleChoiceOption pretty closely.

Parameters:
shortName The shortName of the option. May be empty.
firstLongName The start iterator of the longname pairs.
lastLongName The end iterator of the longname pairs.
optionValue Pointer to the option-value-receiving variable.
defaultValue The default value.
helpText The long helptext.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool CommandlineOptionHandler::SingleChoiceOption::hasValue (  const MC2String &  option  )  const [virtual]
 

Asks the option whether it expects a value or not.

Parameters:
option The actual option name found on the commandline.
Returns:
True if option equals shortName and false otherwise.

Reimplemented from CommandlineOptionHandler::Option.

Called by the parsre when the value shoul be set.

Parameters:
index The index of the value. Not used by SingleChoiceOption.
